hint: How necessary is the third round?
name: My Accountant
text: While searching through some old files we found {{ciphertext.txt, accounting sheets}} that could point to nefarious business. However, we only happen to have {{balance.txt, one page}} in plaintext. Could you recover the key? It will be a hex-encoded string. You can access the program they used for encryption {{account_encryption.py, here}}.
